DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine add counter nutritional supplement benefit participant currently take prescribe antidepressant experience complete remission depression symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study : Combining Nutritional Supplements With Standard Antidepressant Treat Depression .
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria : Detroit VA Patients major depression , mild moderate treat SSRI complete remission symptom define `` feel normal self '' Randomized two group : Experimental : receive month supply deplin 15mg , L-tyrosine 6g/d 2 divided dos , L-tryptophan 2g/d 2 divided dos . Control : receive month supply deplin 15mg , 2 placebo pill . Beck Depression Scale ( BDI-2 ) administer baseline every 2 week 1 month .
DOC.criteria: Veterans Administration Medical Center patient major depression , mild moderate treat SSRI complete remission symptom .
